import{loadingReducer}from"./loadingReducer";import{combineReducers,legacy_createStore}from"redux";import{themeReducer}from"../../hw12/bll/themeReducer";const reducers=combineReducers({loading:loadingReducer,// hw10

});const store=legacy_createStore(reducers);export default store;// @ts-ignore
